member.name: D3D12_VIDEO_MOTION_ESTIMATOR_VECTOR_PRECISION_FLAGS
member.summary: Specifies the motion estimation vector precision that a video encoder supports.

member.name: D3D12_VIDEO_MOTION_ESTIMATOR_VECTOR_PRECISION_FLAGS.D3D12_VIDEO_MOTION_ESTIMATOR_VECTOR_PRECISION_FLAG_NONE
member.summary: Vector precision is not supported by the encoder.

member.name: D3D12_VIDEO_MOTION_ESTIMATOR_VECTOR_PRECISION_FLAGS.D3D12_VIDEO_MOTION_ESTIMATOR_VECTOR_PRECISION_FLAG_QUARTER_PEL
member.summary: The vector precision is quarter-pixel motion.
